rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small foyer and cloakroom area.
Spacious living area adjacent to an open patio for natural light.
Modern dining space with views of the garden and natural ventilation.
Functional kitchen with proper ventilation, natural light from windows and skylights.
Luxurious master bedroom with attached bathroom and en-suite closet, positioned in the east for positive energy.
Cozy guest room located near common areas to enhance connectivity.
Well-lit study/library area designed for quiet reading and work, situated to receive ample daylight with southern exposure for warmth.
Shared bathroom for guests, conveniently located near living areas.

openings.description: Large opening with a vestibule to control heat and noise.
Large windows for cross ventilation and natural light.
Skylights installed for additional daylight during cloudy weather.
Open balcony door leading to a covered outdoor space.
Separate entrance to master bedroom for privacy and Vastu alignment.
East-facing window ensuring morning sunlight and positive energy.
